PushManagerGetSubscription.summary: The PushManager.getSubscription() method of the interface retrieves an existing push subscription.

remarks.para: It returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to a object containing details of an existing subscription. If no existing subscription exists, this resolves to a null value.

PushManagerGetSubscription.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to a object or null.
